resources.string: LuzWiFi Plugin have been installed properly in your system. Remember to config your LuzWiFi Controller IP here and execute your eKameno Remote App in your regular phone in order to control it.
This Plugin should be installed only in devices with eKameno Node App. eKameno Remote acts as a remote control of eKameno Nodes, therefore none plugins can work here.
This plugin is ment to work only with eKameno system. Control your LuzWiFi Device and add some extra features to the oficial App like Voice commands, NFC tags and many more with eKameno
Give security to your home with an alarm which detects motion.
Look what happens in your home anytime with the intant pictures.
Make your favorite music sound anytime.
Set up your custom actions to customize your home.
Record NFC tags to obey your commands.
Ask whatever you want to artificial intelligence, it will surprise you.
Always evolving, add new plugins and have new skills.
